original_text: They want things that belong to other people. They are drunks. They have wild parties. And they like to do many other bad things like those. So I warn you again, as I have already warned you before. People who continue to do any of those bad things will not receive good things from God. God has prepared those good things for the people who belong to his kingdom.
korean_text: 투기와 술 취함과 방탕함과 또 그와 같은 것들이라 전에 너희에게 경계한 것 같이 경계하노니 이런 일을 하는 자들은 하나님의 나라를 유업으로 받지 못할 것이요

sentences.original_text: They want things that belong to other people.
And they like to do many other bad things like those.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 그와 같은 다른 많은 나쁜 일들을 하는 것을 좋아합니다.

sentences.original_text: as I have already warned you before.
People who continue to do any of those bad things
sentences.korean_translation: 그런 나쁜 일들 중 어느 것이라도 계속하는 사람들은

sentences.original_text: will not receive good things from God.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님으로부터 좋은 것들을 받지 못할 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: God has prepared those good things
for the people who belong to his kingdom.
